name: 别找我麻烦
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 蔡健雅
[00:01.00] 作词 : 蔡健雅
[00:09.850]是故意的吗
[00:12.650]是我得罪谁了吗
[00:15.200]这一天竟然每件事情都失算
[00:20.620]只想转个弯
[00:23.120]却绕到了飞机场
[00:25.870]发现没钱在身上
[00:32.400]乌云乌云快走开
[00:34.470]你可知道我不常带把伞 带把伞啊
[00:42.420]乌云乌云快走开
[00:45.170]感觉你在挑战我的乐观 的乐观
[00:53.100]你还想怎么样
[00:55.800]搞得我快抓狂
[00:58.500]求你帮个忙
[01:01.160]乌云乌云别找我麻烦
[01:14.010]是注定的吗
[01:16.510]我穿上了白衬衫
[01:19.310]拿一杯咖啡偏在我身上倒翻
[01:24.610]不如跑一趟
[01:27.210]商店它却刚打烊
[01:29.860]妙不可言的下场
[01:36.300]乌云乌云 快走开
[01:38.510]你可知道我不常带把伞 带把伞啊
[01:46.360]乌云乌云快走开

[01:57.130]你还想怎么样

[02:39.840]乌云乌云快走开

[02:50.480]你还想怎么样

name: I'm Yours
lyric:
[00:12.489]Well you done done me and you bet I felt it
[00:16.030]I tried to be chill but you're so hot that I melted
[00:19.400]I fell right through the cracks
[00:21.920]and now I'm trying to get back
[00:24.929]Before the cool done run out
[00:26.960]I'll be giving it my bestest
[00:28.760]Nothing's going to stop me but divine intervention
[00:31.870]I reckon its again my turn to win some or learn some
[00:38.270]But I won't hesitate no more, no more
[00:45.390]It cannot wait I'm yours
[01:03.949]Well open up your mind and see like me
[01:07.530]Open up your plans and damn you're free
[01:10.610]Look into your heart and you'll find love love love love
[01:16.230]Listen to the music of the moment people dance and sing
[01:20.720]We're just one big family
[01:23.520]It's your God-forsaken right to be loved love loved love love
[01:31.820]So I won't hesitate no more no more
[01:39.520]It cannot wait I'm sure
[01:44.630]There's no need to complicate
[01:48.960]Our time is short
[01:52.230]This is our fate I'm yours
[01:57.770]do do do do you but do you do do do
[02:02.000]But do you want to come on
[02:02.870]Scooch on over closer dear
[02:06.240]And i will nibble your ear
[02:22.540]I've been spending way too long checking my tongue in the mirror
[02:26.890]And bending over backwards just to try to see it clearer
[02:30.700]but My breath fogged up the glass
[02:32.759]And so I drew a new face and laughed
[02:36.710]I guess what i'ma saying is there ain't no better reason
[02:39.879]To rid yourself of vanity and just go with the seasons
[02:43.200]It's what we aim to do
[02:45.589]Our name is our virtue
[02:49.290]But I won't hesitate no more no more
[02:56.390]It cannot wait I'm yours
[03:02.670]Open up your mind and see like me (I won't hesitate)
[03:05.829]Open up your plans and damn you're free (No more, no more)
[03:08.980]Look into your heart and you'll find the sky is yours (It cannot wait, I'm sure)
[03:14.519]So please don't, please don't please don't (There's no need to complicate)
[03:17.200]There's no need to complicate (Our time is short)
[03:20.120]Coz our time is short (This is our fate)
[03:22.589]This is this is this is our fate
[03:25.120]I'm yours

name: A Thousand Year
lyric:
[00:21.010]Heart beats fast
[00:24.900]Colors and promises
[00:29.850]How to be brave
[00:32.510]How can I love when I'm afraid to fall
[00:40.050]But watching you stand alone
[00:45.260]All of my doubt
[00:47.820]Suddenly goes away somehow
[00:54.190]One step closer
[01:02.100]I have died everyday waiting for you
[01:07.330]Darling, don't be afraid
[01:09.930]I have loved you for a thousand years
[01:17.420]I love you for a thousand more
[01:29.320]Time stands still
[01:33.050]Beauty in all she is
[01:38.180]I will be brave
[01:40.659]I will not let anything take away
[01:48.409]What's standing in front of me
[01:53.730]Every breath
[01:56.180]Every hour has come to this
[02:02.590]One step closer
[02:10.340]I have died everyday waiting for you
[02:15.720]Darling, don't be afraid
[02:18.210]I have loved you for a thousand years
[02:24.550]I love you for a thousand more
[02:31.450]All along I believed I would find you
[02:36.510]Time has brought your heart to me
[02:39.400]I have loved you for a thousand years
[02:46.290]I love you for a thousand more
[03:16.350]One step closer
[03:26.810]One step closer
[03:34.490]I have died everyday waiting for you
[03:39.770]Darling, don't be afraid
[03:42.260]I have loved you for a thousand years
[03:48.580]I love you for a thousand more
[03:55.429]And all along I believed I would find you
[04:00.500]Time has brought your heart to me
[04:03.040]I have loved you for a thousand years
[04:09.820]I love you for a thousand more

name: Love In December
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Johan Angergård
[00:01.00] 作词 : Johan Angergård
[00:27.890]so this is love
[00:29.700]in the end of december
[00:33.400]quiet nights
[00:36.030]quiet stars
[00:38.720]and i'm here
[00:41.120]monday to sunday
[00:44.430]cause you're fragile
[00:47.090]and i'm weak
[00:48.250]
[01:00.900]so you fall
[01:02.710]when the nights grow longer
[01:06.410]into sleep
[01:08.800]and won't wake up
[01:11.960]and i'm here
[01:13.900]outside here beside you
[01:17.470]and i'm weak
[01:20.280]until rhe spring
[01:21.180]
[01:28.040]don't you worry
[01:30.770]i'll be there for you
[01:33.210]don't worry about me
[01:35.580]you know me better than that
[01:39.070]don't you worry
[01:41.380]i'll be there for you
[01:45.080]i'll catch you if you would fall
[01:49.140]
[02:12.230]so you drift
[02:14.360]when the days grow colder
[02:18.020]away from me
[02:20.920]and won't look back
[02:23.570]far away
[02:25.290]and i can't guide you
[02:28.950]but i'm here
[02:31.850]til the spring
[02:32.520]
[02:39.580]don't you worry
[02:42.060]i'll be there for you
[02:44.670]don't worry about me
[02:46.850]you know me better than that
[02:50.460]don't you worry
[02:52.790]I'll be there for you
[02:56.700]i'll catch you if you would fall
[03:01.370]don't worry about me
[03:04.270]I'll be there for you
[03:06.630]don't worry about me
[03:09.050]you know me better than that
[03:12.870]don't you worry
[03:15.230]I 'll be there for you
[03:19.170]i'll catch you if you would fall
[03:24.510]i'll catch you if you would fall
[03:28.560]

name: You Are Beautiful
lyric:
[00:24.21]My life is brilliant
[00:25.58]
[00:35.75]My life is brilliant
[00:37.38]
[00:38.62]My love is pure
[00:40.12]
[00:41.49]I saw an angel
[00:42.99]
[00:43.80]Of that I'm sure
[00:45.93]
[00:46.55]She smiled at me on the subway
[00:48.54]
[00:49.54]She was with another man
[00:51.23]
[00:52.42]But I won't lose no sleep on that
[00:55.47]'Cause I've got a plan
[00:57.47]
[00:59.15]You're beautiful  You're beautiful
[01:03.27]
[01:04.96]You're beautiful  it's true
[01:07.83]
[01:10.43]I saw your face in a crowded place
[01:15.36]
[01:16.04]And I don't know what to do
[01:21.09]
[01:23.15]'Cause I'll never be with you
[01:26.96]
[01:37.51]Yeah  she caught my eye
[01:39.94]
[01:40.88]As we walked on by
[01:42.94]
[01:43.75]She could see from my face that I was
[01:46.75]
[01:47.81]F**king high
[01:49.30]
[01:50.30]And I don't think that I'll see her again
[01:54.79]But we shared a moment that will last till the end
[02:00.29]
[02:01.35]You're beautiful  You're beautiful
[02:05.90]
[02:07.84]You're beautiful  it's true
[02:10.89]
[02:13.36]I saw your face in a crowded place
[02:18.04]
[02:18.84]And I don't know what to do
[02:23.96]
[02:26.15]'Cause I'll never be with you
[02:29.52]
[02:44.56]You're beautiful  You're beautiful
[02:48.74]
[02:50.30]You're beautiful  it's true
[02:53.24]
[02:55.73]There must be an angel with a smile on her face
[03:00.43]
[03:01.37]When she thought up that I should be with you
[03:05.42]
[03:13.03]But it's time to face the truth
[03:16.71]
[03:18.77]I will never be with you

name: 旅途
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 朴树
[00:01.00] 作词 : 朴树
[00:14.700]我梦到一个孩子
[00:16.700]在路边的花园哭泣
[00:19.700]昨天飞走了心爱的气球
[00:23.700]“你可曾找到请告诉我”  那只气球
[00:28.700]飞到遥远的遥远的那座山后
[00:32.700]老爷爷把它系在屋顶上
[00:36.700]等着爸爸他带你去寻找
[00:40.700]有一天爸爸走累了
[00:42.700]就丢失在深深的陌生山谷
[00:46.700]像那只气球  再也找不到
[00:53.700]这是个旅途
[00:56.700]一个叫做命运的茫茫旅途
[01:00.700]我们偶然相遇  然后离去
[01:04.700]在这条永远不归的路
[01:06.700]我们路过高山
[01:10.700]我们路过湖泊
[01:13.700]我们路过森林
[01:15.700]路过沙漠
[01:17.700]路过人们的城堡和花园
[01:21.700]路过幸福
[01:24.700]我们路过痛苦
[01:27.700]路过一个女人的温暖和眼泪
[01:31.700]路过生命中漫无止境的寒冷和孤独

[02:12.700]在路边的花园哭泣
[02:15.700]昨天飞走了心爱的气球

name: 稻香
lyric:
[by:橘子大宝宝]
[ti:稻香]
[ar:周杰伦]
[00:31.00]对这个世界如果你有太多的抱怨
[00:34.05]跌倒了就不敢继续往前走
[00:37.02]为什麽人要这麽的脆弱 堕落
[00:41.55]请你打开电视看看
[00:43.14]多少人为生命在努力勇敢的走下去
[00:46.89]我们是不是该知足
[00:49.43]珍惜一切 就算没有拥有
[00:54.24]还记得你说家是唯一的城堡
[00:57.49]随着稻香河流继续奔跑
[01:00.42]微微笑 小时候的梦我知道
[01:05.51]不要哭让萤火虫带着你逃跑
[01:09.21]乡间的歌谣永远的依靠
[01:12.12]回家吧 回到最初的美好
[01:41.14]不要这麽容易就想放弃 就像我说的
[01:44.59]追不到的梦想 换个梦不就得了
[01:47.55]为自己的人生鲜艳上色 先把爱涂上喜欢的颜色
[01:51.80]笑一个吧 功成名就不是目的
[01:55.62]让自己快乐快乐这才叫做意义
[01:58.51]童年的纸飞机 现在终於飞回我手里
[02:04.41]所谓的那快乐 赤脚在田里追蜻蜓追到累了
[02:08.62]偷摘水果被蜜蜂给叮到怕了 谁在偷笑呢
[02:13.16]我靠着稻草人吹着风唱着歌睡着了
[02:16.72]哦 哦 午后吉它在虫鸣中更清脆
[02:19.58]哦 哦 阳光洒在路上就不怕心碎
[02:22.53]珍惜一切 就算没有拥有
[02:27.36]还记得你说家是唯一的城堡
[02:31.24]随着稻香河流继续奔跑
[02:34.18]微微笑 小时候的梦我知道
[02:39.35]不要哭让萤火虫带着你逃跑
[02:42.94]乡间的歌谣永远的依靠
[02:45.91]回家吧 回到最初的美好
[02:51.03]还记得你说家是唯一的城堡
[02:54.55]随着稻香河流继续奔跑
[02:57.62]微微笑 小时候的梦我知道
[03:02.67]不要哭让萤火虫带着你逃跑
[03:06.35]乡间的歌谣永远的依靠
[03:09.23]回家吧 回到最初的美好

name: 夜曲
lyric:
[by:立酱]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 周杰伦
[00:01.00] 作词 : 方文山
[00:03.00]编曲：林迈可
[00:04.00]制作人：周杰伦
[00:05.00]合声编写：周杰伦 合声：周杰伦
[00:06.00]录音工程：杨瑞代
[00:07.00]录音室：ALFA STUDIO
[00:08.00]混音工程：林迈可
[00:09.00]混音录音室：VIP STUDIO
[00:24.92]一群嗜血的蚂蚁 被腐肉所吸引
[00:27.67]我面无表情 看孤独的风景
[00:30.42]失去你 爱恨开始分明
[00:33.23]失去你 还有什么事好关心
[00:35.93]当鸽子不再象征和平
[00:38.24]我终于被提醒
[00:39.59]广场上喂食的是秃鹰
[00:41.59]我用漂亮的押韵
[00:43.09]形容被掠夺一空的爱情
[00:46.95]啊 乌云开始遮蔽 夜色不干净
[00:49.40]公园里 葬礼的回音 在漫天飞行
[00:52.30]送你的 白色玫瑰
[00:53.86]在纯黑的环境凋零
[00:55.41]乌鸦在树枝上诡异的很安静
[00:57.91]静静听 我黑色的大衣
[01:00.01]想温暖你 日渐冰冷的回忆
[01:02.41]走过的 走过的 生命
[01:03.87]啊 四周弥漫雾气
[01:05.12]我在空旷的墓地
[01:06.42]老去后还爱你
[01:09.07]为你弹奏萧邦的夜曲
[01:11.77]纪念我死去的爱情
[01:14.72]跟夜风一样的声音
[01:17.32]心碎的很好听
[01:20.08]手在键盘敲很轻
[01:22.88]我给的思念很小心
[01:25.64]你埋葬的地方叫幽冥
[01:30.29]为你弹奏萧邦的夜曲
[01:33.89]纪念我死去的爱情
[01:36.70]而我为你隐姓埋名
[01:39.40]在月光下弹琴
[01:42.06]对你心跳的感应
[01:44.96]还是如此温热亲近
[01:47.82]怀念你那鲜红的唇印
[02:15.30]那些断翅的蜻蜓 散落在这森林
[02:18.05]而我的眼睛 没有丝毫同情
[02:20.90]失去你 泪水混浊不清
[02:23.66]失去你 我连笑容都有阴影
[02:26.41]风在长满青苔的屋顶
[02:28.51]嘲笑我的伤心
[02:29.76]像一口没有水的枯井
[02:31.77]我用凄美的字型
[02:33.42]描绘后悔莫及的那爱情
[02:37.22]为你弹奏萧邦的夜曲
[02:40.07]纪念我死去的爱情
[02:42.82]跟夜风一样的声音
[02:45.62]心碎的很好听
[02:48.33]手在键盘敲很轻
[02:51.08]我给的思念很小心
[02:53.88]你埋葬的地方叫幽冥
[02:58.58]为你弹奏萧邦的夜曲
[03:02.18]纪念我死去的爱情
[03:04.89]而我为你隐姓埋名 在月光下弹琴
[03:10.39]对你心跳的感应 还是如此温热亲近
[03:16.04]怀念你那鲜红的唇印
[03:21.55]一群嗜血的蚂蚁 被腐肉所吸引
[03:24.30]我面无表情 看孤独的风景
[03:27.20]失去你 爱恨开始分明
[03:29.80]失去你 还有什么事好关心
[03:32.50]当鸽子不再象征和平
[03:34.50]我终于被提醒
[03:35.91]广场上喂食的是秃鹰
[03:38.11]我用漂亮的押韵
[03:39.71]形容被掠夺一空的爱情

name: 不要再孤单
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 火星电台/黄少峰
[00:01.00] 作词 : 火星电台/黄少峰
[00:16.94]我在树叶落下的时候等你
[00:20.28]带你去见我的初心
[00:23.97]那是一如童年的晴朗天气
[00:27.29]有人唱绿草如茵
[00:31.14]我要多么的努力才能换来你的心
[00:37.88]我想我应该非常确定你是我唯一
[00:48.82]我想你说
[00:52.26]你不要再孤单让我做你的伴
[00:59.23]有苦我为你分担
